SalvageMission.name: Wreck salvage
SalvageMission.description: Wreck salvage mission description goes here

StatusEffect.welcomemessage: Receiving encrypted transmission: [PASS_3]LLL SLS SL LS LLS S LSSS LLL LSLL

message.text: The thing is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Watcher has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature and its minions.

message.text: The Watcher and his minions have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing Ancient Moloch
MonsterMission.description: This ancient moloch is dangerous enough to cause massive logistics issues and even took down a couple attack submarines. A reward of [reward] is promised to any professional crew who can take it down.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Ancient Moloch has been killed.

message.text: The moloch is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Hammerheads
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Hammerhead has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.

message.text: The Hammerhead is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Matriarch
MonsterMission.description: Eliminate the Hammerhead Matriarch and her minions.

message.text: The Matriarch is eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Small Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A small swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Small Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A small swarm of threshers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Small Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A small pack of young raptors is roaming between [location1] and [location2]. [reward] marks are yours if you kill not just the males, but the females and the hatchlings too.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Small Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A small pack of mature mudraptors is roaming between [location1] and [location2]. Take them down and [reward] marks are yours.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of threshers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A large pack of young raptors is roaming between [location1] and [location2]. [reward] marks are yours if you kill not just the males, but the females and the hatchlings too.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A large pack of mudraptors is roaming back and forth between [location1] and [location2], killing everything in it's path, including military submarines. Over 9000 marks are promised to any mad crew to challenge them.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting titanite
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the titanite deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough titanite. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

SalvageMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
SalvageMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
SalvageMission.successmessage: The artifact has been successfully retrieved

message.text: The artifact is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

OutpostNestMission.name: Clear a Cave
OutpostNestMission.description: This cave is swarming with monsters, preventing future development for humanity. Kill them all and destroy their eggs.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal, so that the neighboring outposts can prosper. They offer you [reward] if you can get the beacon transmitting a signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

EscortMission.name: Personnel Transport
EscortMission.description: Transport personnel safely to the next station. Payment scales with the number of transported personnel.

EscortMission.name: VIP Transport
EscortMission.description: Transport the VIP and their armed escort to the next station.

EscortMission.name: Terrorist Stakeout
EscortMission.description: Separatist terrorists have been hijacking ships in this sector. Our reports suggest that some of them have snuck onto your ship alongside innocent passengers. Make sure the innocent passengers make it to [location2] alive, and be ready for any hostile takeover. Get rid of any terrorists you come across.
EscortMission.successmessage: Personnel transport successful and the terrorists have been dealt with.
